<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 355, 395, 372]]<|/det|> You must answer on the question paper. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 384, 402, 399]]<|/det|> You will need: Geometrical instruments <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[91, 419, 225, 434]]<|/det|> ## INSTRUCTIONS <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 435, 291, 450]]<|/det|> - Answer all questions. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 451, 761, 467]]<|/det|> - Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 466, 808, 481]]<|/det|> - Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 481, 565, 497]]<|/det|> - Write your answer to each question in the space provided. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 497, 482, 512]]<|/det|> - Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 513, 361, 528]]<|/det|> - Do not write on any bar codes. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 529, 550, 545]]<|/det|> - You should use a scientific calculator where appropriate. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 544, 335, 561]]<|/det|> - You may use tracing paper. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 560, 466, 576]]<|/det|> - You must show all necessary working clearly. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 575, 856, 591]]<|/det|> - Give non-exact numerical answers correct to 3 significant figures, or 1 decimal place for angles in degrees, unless a different level of accuracy is specified in the question. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 605, 490, 620]]<|/det|> - For \(\pi\), use either your calculator value or 3.142. <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[91, 651, 214, 664]]<|/det|> ## INFORMATION <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 667, 395, 682]]<|/det|> - The total mark for this paper is 100. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 682, 730, 699]]<|/det|> - The number of marks for each question or part question is shown in brackets [ ].

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 121, 367, 138]]<|/det|>
Area, \(A\), of triangle, base \(b\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 115, 682, 146]]<|/det|>
\[
A=\frac{1}{2} b h
\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 166, 672, 184]]<|/det|>
\[
A=\pi r^{2}
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 170, 308, 185]]<|/det|>
Area, \(A\), of circle of radius \(r\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 219, 385, 234]]<|/det|>
Circumference, \(C\), of circle of radius \(r\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 219, 672, 233]]<|/det|>
\[
C=2 \pi r
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 267, 515, 284]]<|/det|>
Curved surface area, \(A\), of cylinder of radius \(r\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 267, 686, 281]]<|/det|>
\[
A=2 \pi r h
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 314, 537, 331]]<|/det|>
Curved surface area, \(A\), of cone of radius \(r\), sloping edge \(l\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 314, 672, 330]]<|/det|>
\[
A=\pi r l
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 363, 373, 379]]<|/det|>
Surface area, \(A\), of sphere of radius \(r\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 359, 682, 378]]<|/det|>
\[
A=4 \pi r^{2}
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 410, 490, 426]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of prism, cross-sectional area \(A\), length \(l\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 408, 664, 426]]<|/det|>
\[
V=A l
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 456, 435, 474]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of pyramid, base area \(A\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 449, 682, 480]]<|/det|>
\[
V=\frac{1}{3} A h
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 505, 421, 524]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of cylinder of radius \(r\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 503, 680, 521]]<|/det|>
\[
V=\pi r^{2} h
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 552, 396, 571]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of cone of radius \(r\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 546, 690, 575]]<|/det|>
\[
V=\frac{1}{3} \pi r^{2} h
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 603, 336, 620]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of sphere of radius \(r\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 595, 686, 626]]<|/det|>
\[
V=\frac{4}{3} \pi r^{3}
\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 736, 790, 826]]<|/det|>

\begin{aligned}
& \frac{a}{\sin A}=\frac{b}{\sin B}=\frac{c}{\sin C} \\
& a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}-2 b c \cos A \\
& \text { Area }=\frac{1}{2} a b \sin C
\end{aligned}
\]
